User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemaps
Sitemap: https://thepeoplesaffairs.com/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay for respectful crawling
Crawl-delay: 1

# Disallow admin panel
User-agent: *
Disallow: /admin/

# Allow all major search engines
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /

Allow: /

Allow: /

Allow: /

Allow: /

Allow: /
